thread.title: BRIEF-Cardiome Pharma To Pay $2.5 Mln Termination Fee To Cipher If Proposed Arrangement Not Completed

title: BRIEF-Cardiome Pharma To Pay $2.5 Mln Termination Fee To Cipher If Proposed Arrangement Not Completed

organizations.name: proposed arrangement not completed reuters staff

text: March 20, 2018 / 6:35 PM / Updated 18 minutes ago BRIEF-Cardiome Pharma To Pay $2.5 Mln Termination Fee To Cipher If Proposed Arrangement Not Completed Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 20 (Reuters) - Cardiome Pharma Corp: * CARDIOME PHARMA-TERMINATION FEE OF $2.5 MILLION (CAD) PAYABLE BY CO TO CIPHER IN CERTAIN CIRCUMSTANCES IF PROPOSED ARRANGEMENT NOT COMPLETED - SEC FILING‍​ * CARDIOME PHARMA SAYS REVERSE TERMINATION FEE OF $2.5 MILLION (CAD) PAYABLE BY CIPHER TO CO IN CERTAIN CIRCUMSTANCES, IF PROPOSED ARRANGEMENT NOT COMPLETED Source text: [ bit.ly/2DECv7z ] Further company coverage:
